scripts.compile: cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.compile:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && webpack --config webpack.config.js
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && backpack dev
scripts.dev:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build.js && cross-env DEBUG=express:* backpack dev
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build.js && npm run lint && jest --forceExit --config unit.config.json
scripts.test:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node build.js && jest --forceExit --config unit.config.json
